item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 26, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Lossless video compression using Bloom filters (50 points | 10 comments)
2. A new class of materials that can passively harvest water from air (265 points | 103 comments)
3. TSMC bets on unorthodox optical tech (66 points | 24 comments)
4. Show HN: PgDog – Shard Postgres without extensions (96 points | 20 comments)
5. Launch HN: Nomi (YC X25) – Copilot for Sales (48 points | 42 comments)
6. Hacker News now runs on top of Common Lisp (285 points | 139 comments)
7. AI Makes Bad Managers (35 points | 11 comments)

9. Claude 4 and GitHub MCP will leak your private GitHub repositories (87 points | 18 comments)
10. TeleMessage Explorer: a new open-source research tool (69 points | 6 comments)
11. Particle Life simulation in browser using WebGPU (139 points | 47 comments)
12. TeleMessage Customers Include DC Police, Andreessen Horowitz, JP Morgan,Hundreds (161 points | 29 comments)

14. Duolingo CEO tries to walk back AI-first comments, fails (237 points | 170 comments)
15. Creating Debian packages from upstream Git (39 points | 3 comments)

20. German court sends VW execs to prison over Dieselgate scandal (528 points | 218 comments)
21. The double standard of webhook security and API security (93 points | 40 comments)
22. Cloudflare CEO: Football piracy blocks will claim lives (158 points | 143 comments)
23. Mutmut – Python Mutation Tester (4 points | discuss)
24. Show HN: XOff an open source Chrome extension to change X links to Xcancel (3 points | discuss)
25. I think it's time to give Nix a chance (99 points | 85 comments)
26. Venta AI (YC S23) Is Hiring a Founding Full Stack Engineer in Amsterdam ( | hide)
27. Sims, BattleBots, Cellular Automata God and Go (2001) (9 points | 1 comment)
28. Show HN: A minimalist web timer for focus and time tracking (73 points | 36 comments)
29. The truth about soft plastic recycling points at supermarkets (84 points | 99 comments)
30. Sleep apnea pill shows striking success in large clinical trial (168 points | 138 comments)
